Metadata.Total_Companies_Processed: The total number of companies whose financial data has been processed.
Metadata.Total_Companies_With_Zeros: Number of companies that have at least one financial column with zero values.
Metadata.Total_Companies_With_High_Zeros: Number of companies where a significant portion of their financial data contains zeros.
Metadata.Note: If you want to see 'Total_Companies_With_Zeros' and 'Total_Companies_With_High_Zeros', scroll to the end of the JSON.

Companies.Info: A dictionary containing financial data for each company, structured with their name as the key.

Metadata.Headers: List of financial parameters included in the balance sheet.
Metadata.Header_Length: Number of columns in the financial dataset.
Metadata.Row_Count: Number of time periods (e.g., months/quarters/years) for which data is available.
Metadata.Zero_Values_Per_Column: A dictionary showing how many times each column contains zero values.
